name: Easy Mango-Blackberry Smoothie
description: This quick and delicious smoothie has just three ingredients: ripe Ataulfo mango, frozen blackberries, and unsweetened kefir.
recipeIngredient: 1 large ripe Ataulfo mango, peeled and roughly chopped (about 1 cup)

recipeInstructions.text: Add mango, kefir, and blackberries to a blender. Pulse a few times to break up, then blend until smooth, about 20 seconds. Serve immediately.
